name: Hammer
description: A versatile tool for driving nails and breaking objects.

name: Screwdriver Set
description: A set of screwdrivers with various tips for different screws.

name: Power Drill
description: A versatile tool for drilling holes and driving screws.

name: Circular Saw
description: A powerful saw for cutting through wood and other materials.

name: Adjustable Wrench
description: A wrench with adjustable jaws for gripping various sizes of nuts and bolts.

name: Pliers Set
description: A set of pliers for gripping, bending, and cutting wires and other materials.

name: Miter Saw
description: A specialized saw for making precise angled cuts, often used in woodworking.

name: Level
description: A tool for determining if a surface is horizontal or vertical.

name: Tape Measure
description: A flexible ruler used to measure distance or length.

name: Angle Grinder
description: A powerful tool for cutting, grinding, and polishing metal and other materials.

name: Chainsaw
description: A motorized saw with a rotating chain for cutting through wood and other materials.

name: Toolbox Set
description: A set of durable plastic toolboxes for organizing and storing tools.
